title: Mechanical CAD Intern
description: Join Buhl Engineering as a Mechanical CAD Intern and work on cutting-edge engineering projects. You'll get hands-on experience with industry-standard CAD software and collaborate with our talented engineering team.
cardDescription: We're seeking an elite engineer to design subsea-rated hardware with extreme precision tolerances. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on cutting-edge maritime technology that will shape the future of sovereign intelligence systems.
shortDescription: Work on cutting-edge engineering projects with industry-standard CAD software.
fullDescription: We're seeking a talented Mechanical CAD Intern to join our team. You'll have the opportunity to work on real projects, learn from experienced engineers, and develop your skills in a professional environment.
requirements: Strong knowledge of CAD software (Solidworks, AutoCAD, or similar)
Currently pursuing or recently completed degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field
responsibilities: Create and modify CAD models for engineering projects
Assist in design reviews and documentation
Support senior engineers in project development
Contribute to technical drawings and specifications
Participate in team meetings and design discussions
